data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Groningen, Netherlands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Groningen, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, guide the 24,471 believers in Groningen to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 24 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Groningen.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Over 53.13 percent of the people of Groningen are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Iraqi people.
Jesus, please give your people in Groningen, Netherlands a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Groningen, Netherlands.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 324,000 who are far from you in Groningen, Netherlands from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Groningen
